explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of an artificial neural network-based model for solar power forecasting, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of an artificial neural network-based model for forecasting solar power generation.
explanations.deep learning: The title of the paper includes 'Deep learning-based solar power forecasting model', indicating the use of deep learning techniques.
explanations.representation learning: Deep learning inherently involves representation learning, as the neural network learns hierarchical representations of the input data.
explanations.backpropagation: Backpropagation is a fundamental algorithm used in training neural networks, which is implied in the training of the artificial neural network model.
explanations.BP: BP is an abbreviation for backpropagation, which is used in training the neural network model mentioned in the paper.
